reuters.title: PACO PHARMACEUTICAL <PPS> OPENS ON NYSE
reuters.body: Paco Pharmaceutical Services Inc said its common stock began trading today on the New York Stock Exchange. The company's stock opened at 26-3/4 and closed at 26-1/8 on 21,900 shares traded. Paco said NASDAQ will continue to carry its common stock warrants due to expire Decmber 31 under the symbol <PPSIW> and its convertible debentures issued February six under the symbol <PPSIG>. Reuter 
